snippet: BOB DOLE  Speaking yesterday in Visalia, Calif.:    '' Now let's talk about Bill Clinton's war on California. He comes out here a lot for haircuts and other things. And he's going to get another haircut on Nov. 5. He had an offer, he was saying, '...
lead_paragraph: BOB DOLE Speaking yesterday in Visalia, Calif.: '' Now let's talk about Bill Clinton's war on California. He comes out here a lot for haircuts and other things. And he's going to get another haircut on Nov. 5. He had an offer, he was saying, 'California, here we come.' But now California's saying, 'Bill Clinton, it's time to go, it's time to go, it's time to go, it's time to go.'
abstract: Excerpt from remarks by Bob Dole while campaigning in California (S)
